column4: It's about needlez posting 5 lines in concession; which is also called flooding. Hence if he's got a problem which can't be posted in a single or max two lines (or results from a query the, he should use pastebin to post te question/results.
so to paste a direct error message we have to go through a web interface?
Thank you Jordan, I'm famaliar with flooding
As you can see, this IRC goes fast enough as it is. Hence flooding is not liked, so yes. :)
